translations: v．重新唤醒，使再次觉醒：使某人或某物重新恢复活力、意识或感觉。
· The smell of fresh coffee reawakens my senses.
新鲜咖啡的香味使我的感官重新苏醒。

sentences.sentence: She said: “Everyone has a first love. And if this film reawakens your memories, then it has worked.”
sentences.translation: 她说：“每个人都有初恋，如果这部影片勾起了你的回忆，就算成功了。”

sentences.sentence: NASA is using the Deep Space Network and the Mars Odyssey orbiter to listen if the rover reawakens.
sentences.translation: 美国航空航天局正在操作深宇宙通信收集和火星奥德赛号轨道翱翔器听取漫游者是否被再次叫醒。
